lead_paragraph: If the deal is completed, Imagine would gain capital and supporters to expand its ability to back film and television productions and make acquisitions.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

headline.print_headline: With Eye on Growth, Imagine Entertainment Seeks an Investment
headline.main: With Eye on Growth, Imagine Entertainment Seeks an Investment

snippet: If the deal is completed, Imagine would gain capital and supporters to expand its ability to back film and television productions and make acquisitions.
abstract: Imagine Entertainment is close to locking down investment of over $100 million from consortium headed by Raine Group.
